title: When your support... (For ADC players)
body:
Keeps eating every morg binding and dying the second she gets to lane... 

I then looked at the match history for her and she literally out of the last 5 support games only bought sight stone once. 

So basically if you've played support and didn't buy a sightstone within first 15 minutes, LET alone 40 minute games... Uninstall. Thanks.

This is the type of shit that puts me on full-tilt.

Supports in 30+ minute games with no sight stone.

replies.body: I used to main support and still play it a little and most of the time I don't buy sight stone since as a support I'm not your bitch it isn't only my job to ward there is a reason that you can get wards. I don't feel that sight stone is necessary as I usually do my job better without it. There is no reason that you should be tilted by someone not buying sight stone, I don't build it because as a tank I would rather build an armor or magic resist item so I can soak up more damage.

That my friend is why you're bronze 4 and prob will be forever (:

> [{quoted}](name=EIven Rope,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MupUpR7Y,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-19T17:43:32.001+0000)
>
> That my friend is why you're bronze 4 and prob will be forever (:

Note that most of my ranked games I don't play support they are mostly jungle, mid, or top. I said used to main Support and only play it in normals. Just because I enjoy playing something a little different doesn't make me bad.

You want to know the key to winning? Two things:

Vision. 

[And Vision Denial.](https://youtu.be/A5QRH9a3UhM?t=4m44s)

> [{quoted}](name=xdeviltwinkiex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MupUpR7Y,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-04-19T17:52:01.474+0000)
>
> Note that most of my ranked games I don't play support they are mostly jungle, mid, or top. I said used to main Support and only play it in normals. Just because I enjoy playing something a little different doesn't make me bad.

No. I never said you're bad. There are amazing Bronze players that just have horrible decision making when it comes to buying items. Proof is that you think sight stone is a weak item and you do "better without it". Vision is the key to winning 99% of all games.

Which is why you are at the rank you are. 

Learn and progress, refuse to learn and stagnate.

I'd argue taking objectives is the key to winning 100% of all games. I feel like I've lost many games because my ADC decided to play ARAM in the mid lane. If I don't go with, I get scolded for not helping. If I go with, I get to watch minions crush our lane while we prance around mid lane waiting for some fool to get out of position. I really don't understand this "group mid" mentality. It always seems to happen before death timers are long enough to even warrant a death match in the mid lane. Oh, we finally aced the team but two of them are already back up, so I guess we don't even get a turret out of this.

I build Sightstone religiously and I don't believe it makes a difference to my team. It makes a difference to me, which is why I always build Trackers as a Jungler. Vision keeps me alive and helps me make good decisions. I can't vouch if it does anything for my team, since map awareness isn't the strongest trait among my fellow rifters.

After reading this I knew you were bronze, looked you up, and sure enough, you're as bronze as they come.
Maybe the LCS support players shouldnt build ss either.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
the good thing about maining support is youre hardly ever going to be laning against another support main so you're likely at an advantage and you run into ludens echo nami and ancient coin leonas
